publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1004 Mr Mark Ruskell: Westminster Committee on GM Crops-That the Parliament welcomes the publication of the Westminster Environmental Audit Committee's report, GM Food - Evaluating the Farm Scale Trials, and its conclusion that the commercialisation of genetically modified (GM) crops on the basis of the results of the farm scale trials would be irresponsible and calls on the Scottish Executive to endorse this view and uphold the precautionary principle in relation to GM crops.

S2M-1004 Westminster Committee on GM Crops (lodged on 5 March 2004) Patrick Harvie*, Mark Ballard*, Fiona Hyslop*, Elaine Smith*, Tricia Marwick*, Bruce Crawford*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-1004 Westminster Committee on GM Crops (lodged on 5 March 2004) Marlyn Glen*, Chris Ballance*, Rob Gibson*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-1004 Westminster Committee on GM Crops (lodged on 5 March 2004) Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-1004 Westminster Committee on GM Crops (lodged on 5 March 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1004 Westminster Committee on GM Crops (lodged on 5 March 2004) Christine Grahame*
S2M-1004 Westminster Committee on GM Crops (lodged on 5 March 2004) Robin Harper*
S2M-1004 Westminster Committee on GM Crops (lodged on 5 March 2004) Linda Fabiani*
